Name: Mira’s Workshop
About the game: Mira has decided to participate in an exhibition of mechanical animals! With the help of her friends Ash and Summer, Mira started looking for parts for her mechanical masterpiece. Help Mira finish her grand project! Earn coins and build a horse to your liking. Combine and replace parts. Play a variety of Spot the Difference mini-games. Explore a mysterious mechanical world with interesting characters! 150 colorful nonogram puzzles of all difficulty levels, a compelling story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a lot of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself! Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help Mira and her friends finish their project! - 150 colorful and memorable levels! - Build a mechanical horse! - Striking visual effects! - Rich summer colors! - An exciting adventure! - Improve your logical and abstract thinking! - User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
